sentences.sContent: The temples are festooned with lights.

trans.tranCn: 结彩于；[建] 以花彩装饰
trans.tranOther: to cover something with flowers, long pieces of material etc, especially for decoration

trans.tranCn: 花彩；[建] 花彩装饰物
trans.tranOther: a long thin piece of material, flowers etc, used especially for decoration
